volatility3.plugins.windows.registry.use.description: Print userassist registry keys and information.

volatility3.plugins.windows.sessions.Ses.description: Lists Processes with Session information extracted from Environmental Variables.

volatility3.plugins.windows.shimcachemem.description: Reads Shimcache entries from the ahcache.sys AVL tree.

volatility3.plugins.windows.svcdiff.SvcD.description: Compares services found through list walking versus scanning to find rootkits.

volatility3.plugins.windows.svclist.SvcL.description: Lists services contained with the services.exe doubly linked list of services.

volatility3.plugins.windows.registry.hiv.description: Lists the registry hives present in a particular memory image.
Scans for registry hives present in a particular windows memory image.

volatility3.plugins.windows.registry.cer.description: Lists the certificates in the registry's Certificate Store.

volatility3.plugins.windows.info.Info.description: Show OS & kernel details of the memory sample being analyzed.

volatility3.plugins.windows.pstree.PsTre.description: Plugin for listing processes in a tree based on their parent process ID.

volatility3.plugins.windows.iat.IAT.description: Extract Import Address Table to list API functions used by a program contained in external libraries.

volatility3.plugins.windows.pslist.PsLis.description: Lists the processes present in a particular windows memory image.

volatility3.plugins.windows.dlllist.DllL.description: Lists the loaded modules in a particular windows memory image.

volatility3.plugins.windows.malfind.Malf.description: Lists process memory ranges that potentially contain injected code.

volatility3.plugins.windows.callbacks.Ca.description: Lists kernel callbacks and notification routines.

volatility3.plugins.windows.devicetree.D.description: Listing tree based on drivers and attached devices in a particular windows memory image.

volatility3.plugins.windows.driverirp.Dr.description: List IRPs for drivers in a particular windows memory image.

volatility3.plugins.windows.drivermodule.description: Determines if any loaded drivers were hidden by a rootkit.

volatility3.plugins.windows.driverscan.D.description: Scans for drivers present in a particular windows memory image.

volatility3.plugins.windows.filescan.Fil.description: Scans for file objects present in a particular windows memory image.

volatility3.plugins.windows.getsids.GetS.description: Print the SIDs owning each process.

volatility3.plugins.windows.ldrmodules.L.description: Lists the loaded modules in a particular windows memory image.

volatility3.plugins.windows.mbrscan.MBRS.description: Scans for and parses potential Master Boot Records (MBRs).

volatility3.plugins.windows.modscan.ModS.description: Scans for modules present in a particular windows memory image.

volatility3.plugins.windows.mutantscan.M.description: Scans for mutexes present in a particular windows memory image.

volatility3.plugins.windows.netscan.NetS.description: Scans for network objects present in a particular windows memory image.

volatility3.plugins.windows.netstat.NetS.description: Traverses network tracking structures present in a particular windows memory image.

volatility3.plugins.windows.processghost.description: Lists processes whose DeletePending bit is set or whose FILE_OBJECT is set to 0.

volatility3.plugins.windows.psscan.PsSca.description: Scans for processes present in a particular windows memory image.

volatility3.plugins.windows.psxview.PsXV.description: Lists all processes found via four methods described in 'The Art of Memory Forensics' to help identify hidden processes.

volatility3.plugins.windows.skeleton_key.description: Looks for signs of Skeleton Key malware.

volatility3.plugins.windows.symlinkscan..description: Scans for links present in a particular windows memory image.

volatility3.plugins.windows.timers.Timer.description: Print kernel timers and associated module DPCs.

volatility3.plugins.windows.registry.amc.description: Extract information on executed applications from the AmCache.

volatility3.plugins.windows.cmdscan.CmdS.description: Looks for Windows Command History lists.

volatility3.plugins.windows.debugregiste.description: Gathers information related to the debug registers for the given thread

volatility3.plugins.windows.orphan_kerne.description: Gathers information related to the debug registers for the given thread

volatility3.plugins.windows.registry.sch.description: Decodes scheduled task information from the Windows registry

volatility3.plugins.windows.unhooked_sys.description: Looks for signs of Skeleton Key malware

volatility3.plugins.windows.deskscan.Des.description: Scans for the Desktop instances of each Window Station.

volatility3.plugins.windows.desktops.Des.description: Enumerates the Desktop instances of each Window Station.

volatility3.plugins.windows.direct_syste.description: Detects the Direct System Call technique used to bypass EDRs.

volatility3.plugins.windows.indirect_sys.description: Detects Indirect System Call technique used to evade detection.

volatility3.plugins.windows.registry.get.description: Reports registry hives with a hooked GetCellRoutine handler.

volatility3.plugins.windows.verinfo.VerI.description: Lists version information from PE files.

volatility3.plugins.windows.windows.Wind.description: Enumerates the Windows of Desktop instances.

volatility3.plugins.windows.windowstatio.description: Scans for top level Windows Stations.

volatility3.plugins.linux.pstree.PsTree.name: volatility3.plugins.linux.pstree.PsTree
volatility3.plugins.linux.pstree.PsTree.description: Plugin for listing processes in a tree based on their parent process ID.

volatility3.plugins.linux.bash.Bash.description: Recovers bash command history from memory.

volatility3.plugins.linux.check_afinfo.C.description: Verifies the operation function pointers of network protocols.

volatility3.plugins.linux.check_creds.Ch.description: Checks if any processes are sharing credential structures.

volatility3.plugins.linux.check_idt.Chec.description: Checks if the IDT has been altered.

volatility3.plugins.linux.check_modules..description: Compares module list to sysfs info, if available.

volatility3.plugins.linux.check_syscall..description: Check system call table for hooks.

volatility3.plugins.linux.elfs.Elfs.description: Lists all memory mapped ELF files for all processes.

volatility3.plugins.linux.envars.Envars.description: Lists processes with their environment variables.

volatility3.plugins.linux.iomem.IOMem.description: Generates an output similar to /proc/iomem on a running system.

volatility3.plugins.linux.keyboard_notif.description: Parses the keyboard notifier call chain.

volatility3.plugins.linux.lsof.Lsof.description: Lists all memory maps for all processes.

volatility3.plugins.linux.malfind.Malfin.description: Lists process memory ranges that potentially contain injected code.

volatility3.plugins.linux.mountinfo.Moun.description: Lists mount points on processes mount namespaces.

volatility3.plugins.linux.psaux.PsAux.description: Lists processes with their command line arguments.

volatility3.plugins.linux.pslist.PsList.description: Lists the processes present in a particular Linux memory image.

volatility3.plugins.linux.psscan.PsScan.description: Scans for processes present in a particular Linux image.

volatility3.plugins.linux.sockstat.Socks.description: Lists all network connections for all processes.

volatility3.plugins.linux.boottime.Boott.description: Shows the time the system was started

volatility3.plugins.linux.hidden_modules.description: Carves memory to find hidden kernel modules

volatility3.plugins.linux.ptrace.Ptrace.description: Enumerates ptrace's tracer and tracee tasks

volatility3.plugins.linux.graphics.fbdev.description: Extract framebuffers from the fbdev graphics subsystem

volatility3.plugins.linux.ip.Addr.description: Lists network interface information for all devices

volatility3.plugins.linux.ip.Link.description: Lists information about network interfaces similar to `ip link show`

volatility3.plugins.linux.modxview.Modxv.description: Centralizes module check results to efficiently spot modules presence and taints.

volatility3.plugins.linux.pagecache.Reco.description: Recovers the cached filesystem into a compressed tarball.

volatility3.plugins.linux.pidhashtable.P.description: Enumerates processes through the PID hash table

volatility3.plugins.linux.pscallstack.Ps.description: Enumerates the call stack of each task

volatility3.plugins.linux.tracing.perf_e.description: Lists performance events for each process.
